column1: Vanløse is one of the 10 official districts of Copenhagen
column2: Denmark. It lies on the western border of the municipality.  Vanløse covers an area of 6.69 km²
column5: making Vanløse the smallest district of Copenhagen

column1: to the southeast is Frederiksberg municipality
column2: which is not a part of Copenhagen municipality but rather an enclave surrounded by the municipality

column1: to the west is Rødovre municipality
column2: which is outside the Copenhagen municipality area
partially separated by Damhus Lake (Damhus Sø).

column1: The French artist Paul Gauguin (1848 - 1903) lived at Bogholdergården in the street Bogholder Allé during his stay in Copenhagen in 1884-1885.

column2: the Danish artist Henry Heerup (1907 - 1993) lived for many years in the street Rødtjørnevej in Vanløse.

column1: The local Hyltebjerg Church (Ålekistevej 89) is seen at 1:34:11 in the 1978 Olsen-banden film The Olsen Gang Sees Red.Singer Van Morrison lived in Vanløse with his Danish girlfriend from 1980 until 1983. His song Vanlose Stairway deals with sitting on the stairs of the local station.
